description:
We, at Paris Caretaker Services (PCS), form a chain of real estate concierge services specializing in seasonal rental management, inspired by the well-known Airbnb model. Our journey began in 2018 in Paris, and since then, our rapid growth has resulted from our commitment to the quality of hospitality and the diversity of our services.

We offer a complete solution for property owners looking to rent out their properties, thereby eliminating the administrative burden associated with renting. We handle every step of the process, from check-in and check-out of clients to cleaning the property, publishing attractive ads, communicating with travelers, and managing maintenance and repairs.

Our online platform simplifies the process, allowing property owners to request quote simulations, while travelers have access to a variety of services. Our business model is based on transparent rates, generally 20% of the nightly rental price, with additional fixed and logistical fees. Thanks to our success in Paris, we have expanded our presence to other districts of the capital as well as tourist destinations such as Nice and Biarritz.

prenomMin: The first name must contain at least 1 character
prenomMax: The first name cannot exceed 30 characters
dateMin: You must be less than 100 years old to register
dateMax: You must be strictly 18 years old to register

emailMax: The email address cannot exceed 50 characters

emailBanned: This email has been banned, please contact support
footerTagline: The best place to find the rental that suits you
companyDescription: The best rental service in Paris, Troyes, Nice. A trusting relationship that allows you to thrive
name: Name

certificationNote: Note that once certified in a domain, making a new request means changing the domain. You cannot operate in two domains simultaneously.
